subject: Communication
title: Giving Feedback With EQ
description: A fast breakdown of Giving Feedback With EQ for builders.

hook.text: The same feedback delivered by two managers: one triggered tears, the other triggered growth. The words were identical.

buildup.text: Emotionally intelligent feedback considers timing, emotional state, relationship context, and the other person's.

discovery.text: Research shows feedback given when the receiver is stressed, tired, or publicly exposed triggers defensive shutdown.

twist.text: Positive-to-negative ratio matters: Losada's research suggests 3:1 positive-to-constructive ratio maintains receptivity.

climax.text: EQ in feedback means asking: 'Is this the right moment? Am I the right person?

punchline.text: Good feedback changes behavior. Great feedback changes it without breaking.

quiz.question: What positive-to-constructive feedback ratio does research suggest?
